silex_client.action.action_buffer module¶

class silex_client.action.action_buffer.ActionBuffer(name: str, ws_connection: silex_client.network.websocket.WebsocketConnection)¶

Bases: collections.abc.Iterator

Store the state of an action, it is used as a comunication payload with the UI

COMMAND_TEMPLATE = {'path': <class 'str'>}¶
STEP_TEMPLATE = {'commands': <class 'list'>, 'index': <class 'int'>}¶
commands: dict¶

A dict of list of commands ordered by step names

get_commands(step: Optional[str] = None)¶

Helper to get a command that belong to this action The data is quite nested, this is just for conveniance

get_parameter(step: str, index: int, name: str)¶

Helper to get a parameter of a command that belong to this action The data is quite nested, this is just for conveniance

name: str¶

The name of the action (usualy the same as the config file)

receive(timeout: int)¶

Wait for the UI to send back a buffer and deserialize it

send()¶

Serialize and send this buffer to the UI though websockets

set_parameter(step: str, index: int, name: str, value: Any)¶

Helper to set a parameter of a command that belong to this action The data is quite nested, this is just for conveniance

property status¶

The status of the action depends of the status of its commands

uid: uuid.UUID¶
update_commands(commands: dict)¶

Check and conform a dict that represent the commands, generally comming from a config file. Filters out all the invalid data by checkinh if it matches the templates arguments

variables: dict¶

Dict of variables that are global to all the commands of this action

ws_connection: silex_client.network.websocket.WebsocketConnection¶
